short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for YouTube shorts to disable (doom)scrolling

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension prevents users from scrolling through YouTube shorts, allowing only the first to be viewed. 

It's helpful for people who find themselves watching YouTube shorts endlessly, and would rather not be doomscrolling.
